scripts.dev: NODE_LANG=TS NODE_ENV=development ts-node-dev --respawn bin/www.ts | bunyan -o short
scripts.dev:start: NODE_LANG=TS NODE_ENV=production ts-node bin/www.ts | bunyan -o short
scripts.start: npm run build && NODE_LANG=JS NODE_ENV=production pm2 start build/bin/www.js | bunyan -o short
scripts.build:dev: npm run build && NODE_LANG=JS NODE_ENV=development node build/bin/www.js | bunyan -o short
scripts.build:start: npm run build && NODE_LANG=JS NODE_ENV=production node build/bin/www.js | bunyan -o short
scripts.deploy: npm run build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js
